presentationTable.name: Facts - Ratings and Assessments
presentationTable.description: This folder provides metrics related to learner's ratings and assessment scores of learning items

presentationColumns.name: Overall Learning Item Rating
presentationColumns.description: Provides the average overall rating of a learning item
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Learning Ratings.Overall Learning Item Rating

presentationColumns.name: Average Learning Item Rating - Workforce Structures
presentationColumns.description: Provides the average rating of a learning item by various dimensions
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Learning Ratings.Average Learning Item Rating - Workforce Structures

localization.localizationKey: Average Learning Item Rating - Workforce Structures

presentationColumns.name: High Satisfaction Learners
presentationColumns.description: Provides the count of learners that rated a learning item with score = 5
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Learning Ratings.High Satisfaction Learners

presentationColumns.name: Low Satisfaction Learners
presentationColumns.description: Provides the count of learners that rated a learning item with score = 1
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Learning Ratings.Low Satisfaction Learners

presentationColumns.name: Top Rated Courses
presentationColumns.description: Provides the count of courses that have ratings >= 4
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Learning Ratings.Top Rated Courses
